statements.select: select a.ModuleId,a.ApplicationId,a.ModuleCode,isnull(c.AliasName, a.AliasName) as AliasName, isnull(c.Position, a.Position) as Position,isnull(c.Location, a.Location ) as Location ,isnull(c.Size, a.Size ) as Size,isnull(c.ForeColor, a.ForeColor ) as ForeColor,isnull(c.BackColor, a.BackColor ) as BackColor from Auth_Module a inner join Auth_AreaModule b on a.ModuleId =b.ModuleId left join Auth_AreaModuleSetting c on b.AreaId=c.AreaId and b.ModuleId=c.ModuleId where a.Status=1 and b.AreaId=#AreaId# ApplicationId=#ApplicationId# Order by a.ApplicationId, isnull(c.AliasName, a.AliasName ) asc
